plan_name: Star Super Surplus (Floater) Insurance Policy (Gold Plan)
day_care: All day care procedures are covered up to the sum insured

ambulance.air: Covered up to 10% of Sum Insured (available for SI of Rs.10 Lac and above)

recharge_benefit: 50,000/- (for 3L defined limit), 75,000/- (for 5L defined limit), 1,00,000/- (for 10L defined limit), 2,50,000/- (for 15 Lac & above defined limit)
delivery_expenses: Covered up to Rs.50,000/- per policy year (waiting period 1 year)
wellness_program: Available via Mobile App ‘Star Power’ & Customer Portal
migration_option: Available after 5 policy yrs with continuity benefits (subject to Underwriting approval). Conditions apply: Insured before 50 yrs, continuous renewal, no claims in preceding 5 years, exercise for all insured persons, policy not renewed further if option exercised.
